column3: News;Phnom Penh: A s body of a man
column4: thought to be just sleeping on the side of the road was found at 6:00 am December 8
column9: Phnom Penh.------When police arrived at the scene to check
column10: they discovered the body of an unidentified 40-year-old man.------The body was carried away in a police trucks to Russian hospital
